overview: Invited by Galerie de Locataires, six artists in Venice with the help of a single camera recorded a diary of the sailing through the Venetian canals - Jean-Pierre Bertrand, Alain Fleisher, Thierry Kuntzel, Michel Snow, Groupe To and Goran Trbuliak. Lâ€™air du large is Trbuljak's recording from the boat.
title: L'air du large
